actions.text: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 185 (Roll no. 81).
Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Eshoo to the Burgess amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Eshoo to the Burgess amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 185 (Roll no. 81).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to require the EPA, as part of a research and development program, to consider issues with respect to increased volatile emissions or increased nitrogen oxide emissions. As amended by the Eshoo amendment (A002), the original text was replaced with language that requires the EPA, as part of a research and development program, to consider strategies to minimize emissions from infrastructure.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to add a paragraph to section 3 including provisions with respect to increased volatile emissions or increased nitrogen oxide emissions.

purpose: An amendment to insert a new paragraph in lieu of the matter proposed to be inserted by the Burgess amendment to section 3. The new matter seeks to insert text regarding strategies to minimize emissions from infrastructure.
